results.description:
This is my second year attending this valuable program. Under Lee Reiser, ACA level ll instructor, will help you hone your existing skills, learn new ones properly and introduce new people to the world of kayaking. In a beautiful heated pool with all kayaks and gear provided you can train for 2 hours learning bracing, rolling, rescues etc. and in return help the public for 2 hours by setting up and putting equipment away, greeting the public students, assisting instructors etc. All level of kayakers are welcome. The sessions are as follows:
Course 1 Saturday - Nov. 14,21; Dec. 5, 12 (completed)
Course 2 " - Jan. 9, 16, 23, 30 (completed)
Course 3 " - Feb. 6, 13, 27; March 5
The time for volunteers to practice is from 3 to 4 pm and the time to volunteer is from 4 to 6 pm. Please arrive at least 15 minutes before so you can get ready. Pack a small bag with your change of clothes. The pool is heated but you may want to wear a wet suit, bringing your own PFD, paddle and skirt can add to your comfort level. Pack a small bag with a change of clothes, towel etc and bring a lock for the lockers.
Please fill out the volunteer packet which can be obtained from the Yonkers Club site: http://www.yprc.org
click on the Riverbank link once you are in the site and download the NY community Kayak Program packet. If you commit to at least 1 session you will be provided with a parking pass.

DIRECTIONS- From 138th St. head west and make a left onto 12th Ave., Take the 1st right beneath the West Side Hwy (by the restaurant) then swing right again past the first guard booth. Follow the roadway in and around, curve left and make a hard left U-turn into the parking area. Use the elevator to get to the park on the upper level walk to the pool area. Make sure you have a parking permit in your car window. Please car pool as parking is limited.

See Nov. 21, 2015 for additional information on these classes.
results.name: Volunteer, learn new skills and kayak at the NY Community Kayak Program.

104 N. 10th Street
Kenilworth, NJ 07083

Mix and Mingle : 7:30-9:30pm
Prize drawing at 9:30pm
Done at 9:30pm and then stay & party until closing with no cover!!

FIND YOUR VALENTINE AT OUR PRE-VALENTINE'S WEEKEND EVENT ON FEBRUARY 13TH!  INCLUDES: FREE APPETIZERS UNTIL 8:30 PM!


INCLUDES:
- DRINK SPECIALS during the event *, AND FREE APPETIZERS (until 8:30 PM),
- Free admission into 10th Street Live (no additional cover if you stay afterwards)
- Great prizes, and the opportunity to massively mix, mingle, make new friends, and who knows what else!


How It Works
Every woman gets a padlock. Every man gets a key. Your goal is to match the right key with the right padlock. Every time you unlock you get a ticket that enters you into the drawing to win great prizes from our party sponsors. Prizes such as cold hard cash, hotel stays, dinners, tickets to popular things to do and more. After every unlock you get another lock or key so you can get back into the fray and meet more people!

Register at www.lockandkeyevents.com/NNJ!! Use the code NNJMEETUP to attend for ONLY $21 - OUR MEET-UP MEMBERS PAY A MUCH LOWER PRICE TO ATTEND THESE SUPER FUN EVENTS THAN ANYONE ELSE. Or, you can pay $27 CASH at the door IF you put in an RSVP. Otherwise, it's $32 at the door!!

PRIZES!

Every time you unlock, you can win prizes such as:

One $50 CASH Prize!

One - Pair of Tickets to see a Broadway Show <a>TBA</a> ($200 value/pair)

One - Pair of Tickets to see an Off-Broadway Show <a>TBA</a> ($110 value/pair)

One - Gift Certificate for 10th Street Live ($25 value)

Complimentary Admission tickets to  Pre-Dating Speed Dating Events ($35 Value)

Several Copies of the book "No More Dating Pigs - You Are What You Date" by Dating Author Norah Marler ($8.95 value each)

Complimentary Admissions into future Lock And Key Events

And more!

Please email or call me with any questions!!

See you there~
Marcy

results.description:
Get your tickets at: http://www.ClickMixers.com/over40.html

40 & Over Valentine Singles Mixer (Light Appetizers, Prizes, Ice Breakers)!

Wow - Valentine weekend is already here! Come on out and make it a great weekend at our 40 & Over Valentine Singles Mixer! We get it... You want to meet someone but don't feel like hanging out in bars among a bunch of 20 somethings or wasting time weeding through online dating profiles. You've been there, done that and want to find your mature match who is tired of all the childish games and ready for something real. Well... our 40 & Over Valentine Singles Mixer is the perfect place for you!


THIS IS A MULTI-MEETUP GROUP EVENT. OVER 150 SINGLES WILL BE ATTENDING. THE RSVP LIST ON THIS PAGE IS ONLY A SMALL PORTION OF ACTUAL ATTENDEES.

TICKET PRICE: $20
Ticket price will be going up to $30 at the door so we recommend getting them ahead of time to save money and guarantee your spot.
GET YOUR TICKETS AT: http://www.ClickMixers.com/over40.html

WHEN: Saturday, February 13th, 7:30 PM - 12:30 AM (If coming in from a distance, it's perfectly fine if you arrive at 8:00 or after)
WHERE: Pranna Lounge (79 Madison Avenue, at 28th St., NYC)

* Over 150 Single Professionals Attending!
* Suggested Age Range: 40s & 50s Plus Welcome To Attend
* Drink Specials!
* Free Light Passed Appetizers From 8:00 PM to 9:00 PM
* Icebreakers With Chances To Win Prizes!
* Music At Just The Right Volume For Mingling
* Typically 70% of Attendees Come Alone (30% bring friends)
* Dress Code: Neat, Professional or Trendy (No sneakers, gym wear or t-shirts)

One of the great things about a Click event is that we do our best to gender balance our mixers.... Meaning that we keep the male/female ratio close and never let our parties have either WAY too many men or WAY too many women. As we get closer to the event date, we may shut down ticket sales for one gender to help keep the ratios balanced. Therefore we highly recommend getting your ticket/s as soon as possible to secure your spot.

TICKET PRICE: $20
Ticket price will be going up to $30 at the door so we recommend getting them ahead of time to save money and guarantee your spot.
GET YOUR TICKETS AT: http://www.ClickMixers.com/over40.html

results.description:
Valentine's weekend is almost here and it's the perfect time to get out there and find that special someone. We realize that online dating can be tedious and all the bars in NYC are packed with 20s & 30s. That's why we've created this Valentine's event filled with more mature singles (40s & 50s)!  

GET TICKETS HERE - https://dljparty.ticketleap.com/4087/dates/Feb-13-2016_at_0730PM

Prepay Only Event. Tickets Not Sold At Door.

• Free Light Appetizers (8-9pm) 

• Drink Specials

• Great Music At Right Volume For Mingling 

• 150+ singles in their 40s, 50s+ 

• Ice Breakers & Prizes 

*MUST PURCHASE TICKET IN ADVANCE HERE ($20) - https://dljparty.ticketleap.com/4087/dates/Feb-13-2016_at_0730PM

*Price goes up to $30 as the event date gets closer. We recommend getting tickets ASAP to save $ and guarantee your spot. This event will sell out, especially for women. 

• As date gets closer, we may shut down tix for one gender to help keep the ratios balanced.  Get tix ASAP to secure your spot, especially women.

PREPAY ONLY - https://dljparty.ticketleap.com/4087/dates/Feb-13-2016_at_0730PM

results.description:
Please read carefully: This event is being hosted by Dave Cervini's newyorksocialnetwork.com and several of their partner Meet Up groups.  The number of people you see registered on your Meet Up represent only a portion of those actually attending. If you have any questions or want to know how many are attending from all groups please contact the event host at [masked]

If you love wine and socializing then let us be your Valentine for this great night out where the focus is on introducing you to some great wines and other fun people!  We have teamed up with several social networking groups to bring you a fantastic wine tasting event for people who love wine and those who know nothing about it!  It is a fun way to spend a Saturday evening in a classy yet casual atmosphere. The wine will be free flowing and you can fill your glass as many times as you would like if you love a particular one!!

PREPAY ONLY EVENT (No tickets sold at door)  - https://www.eventbrite.com/e/6th-annual-world-bar-wine-tasting-party-for-lovers-of-socializing-wine-tickets-21292903648

The night will feature:

-A dozen top notch  wines selected by The World Bar/Madison & Vine Wine Bar wine experts for you to sample with descriptions of each.

-Delicious hot and cold appetizers.

-NYSN staff to welcome you and introduce you to others in the group.

-The bar will remain open for invited guests and wine tasting participants until midnight

What to wear: business casual, lounge

What to expect: 40-50 people. Most come on their own.

Tickets are non refundable unless the event is canceled.

PREPAY ONLY EVENT (No tickets sold at door)  - Get your tickets here: https://www.eventbrite.com/e/6th-annual-world-bar-wine-tasting-party-for-lovers-of-socializing-wine-tickets-21292903648

Once again, this event is being promoted by several Meet Up groups and www.newyorksocialnetwork.com. There will be other people attending.  If you have any questions you can contact the event organizer directly at [masked] or call[masked]

The wine will be free flowing and you can fill your glass as many times as you would like if you love a particular one!!

results.description:
If you love wine, wine lovers and socializing then let us be your Valentine for this great night out where the focus is on introducing you to some great wines!  Forget those cheesy Anti-Valentine's Day Parties around town. We have teamed up with several social networking groups to bring you a fantastic wine tasting event for people who love wine and those who know nothing about it!  It is a fun way to spend a Friday evening in a classy yet casual atmosphere. The wine will be free flowing and you can fill your glass as many times as you would like if you love a particular one!!

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

$47 in advance only - Prepay here:

http://nysnvday2015.eventbrite.com

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

The night will feature:

-A dozen top notch  wines selected by The World Bar/Madison & Vine Wine Bar wine experts for you to sample with descriptions of each.

-Delicious hot and cold appetizers.

-NYSN staff to welcome you and introduce you to others in the group.

-The bar will remain open for invited guests and wine tasting participants until midnight

What to wear: business casual, lounge

What to expect: 40-50 people. Most come on their own

Tickets are non refundable unless the event is canceled.

Address:

The World Bar
845 United Nations Plaza
Corner 1st ave and east 48th
New York, NY

The New York Irish Center is proud to welcome back Jamesons Revenge, one of the finest traditional live acts in the New York area.

ADVANCE TICKETS $22 ea. are available through this meetup, so book yours now.


</a> Please REMEMBER that a meetup RSVP YES DOES NOT SECURE YOUR SEAT and as SEATING IS LIMITED, so we strongly recommend booking in advance.

SHOW TIME is 8.30pm, Doors open at 7.30pm for our DISCOUNT hospitality in our cozy downstairs bar.

If you haven't been before, The Center is located in the beautiful Long Island City neighborhood and is an ideal place to enjoy great live music with an intimate, friendly setting.
<a href="https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=HLKGS9679C4LC"></a>

If you've never seen <a href="http://www.jamesonsrevenge.com/">Jameson Revenge live you will not be disappointed as their energy and consummate musicianship make for a memorable listening experience.


http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cAZwPJ-gH0k

New York Irish Center

10-40 Jackson Ave, LIC, Queens, NY 11101 •[masked] www.nyirish.org
</a>

NYIC is located only fve minutes Grand Central on the 7 train at Vernon Blvd./Jackson Ave. Lots of local street parking after 7pm and if you've not been to the Long Island City neighborhood before COME EARLY and check out the gorgeous waterfront Midtown views only a few short blocks from the Center.


This show is sponsored by <a href="http://jfainsurance.com/">JFA Insurance
providing the local community with the finest Insurance products

results.description:
Wow - Valentine weekend is already here! Come on out and make it a great weekend at our 40 & Over Valentine Singles Mixer! We get it... You want to meet someone but don't feel like hanging out in bars among a bunch of 20 somethings or wasting time weeding through online dating profiles. You've been there, done that and want to find your mature match who is tired of all the childish games and ready for something real. Well... our 40 & Over Valentine Singles Mixer is the perfect place for you!


So what's a Click event? Ever find yourself looking across the bar and saying, “He’s cute, I wonder if he’s single” or “She seems nice, but maybe she has a boyfriend". Well, wonder no more! Everyone at a Click event is single and looking to meet someone. At every Click event we set up fun ice breakers to get the party going (during which you can win prizes!) You can participate or just relax and mingle at your own pace.

We get it... You want to meet someone special but don't feel like hanging out in bars amongst a bunch of recent college grads or wasting time weeding through online dating profiles. You've been there, done that and want to find your mature match who is tired of all the childish games and ready for something real. Well... our Singles Mixer is the perfect place for you!

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

$20 for our members - Prepay here https://40sclickmixer.eventbrite.com

$30 at the door if available

All ATWYS members who pay in advance for this event will receive a promo code for $7 off a speeddating event as well as $5 off our Mix & Mingle Happy Hour. Please be sure to check your eventbrite order confirmation for the promo codes to use to redeem your discount.


~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Over 150 Single Professionals Attending!

Drink Specials!

Win Prizes!

Music At Just The Right Volume For Mingling

Typically 70% of Attendees Come Alone (30% bring friends)

* Over 200 Single Professionals Attending

* Suggested Age Range: Late 30's to 50's

Wow - Valentine weekend is already here! Come on out and make it a great weekend at our 40 & Over Valentine Singles Mixer! We get it... You want to meet someone but don't feel like hanging out in bars among a bunch of 20 somethings or wasting time weeding through online dating profiles. You've been there, done that and want to find your mature match who is tired of all the childish games and ready for something real. Well... our 40 & Over Valentine Singles Mixer is the perfect place for you!

* THIS IS NOT A JEWISH SPECIFIC EVENT.

Get your tickets at: http://www.ClickMixers.com/over40.html


THIS IS A MULTI-MEETUP GROUP EVENT. OVER 150 SINGLES WILL BE ATTENDING. THE RSVP LIST ON THIS PAGE IS ONLY A SMALL PORTION OF ACTUAL ATTENDEES.

TICKET PRICE: $20
Ticket price will be going up to $30 at the door so we recommend getting them ahead of time to save money and guarantee your spot.
GET YOUR TICKETS AT: http://www.ClickMixers.com/over40.html

WHEN: Saturday, February 13th, 7:30 PM - 12:30 AM (If coming in from a distance, it's perfectly fine if you arrive at 8:00 or after)
WHERE: Pranna Lounge (79 Madison Avenue, at 28th St., NYC)

* Over 150 Single Professionals Attending!
* Suggested Age Range: 40s & 50s Plus Welcome To Attend
* Drink Specials!
* Free Light Passed Appetizers From 8:00 PM to 9:00 PM
* Icebreakers With Chances To Win Prizes!
* Music At Just The Right Volume For Mingling
* Typically 70% of Attendees Come Alone (30% bring friends)
* Dress Code: Neat, Professional or Trendy (No sneakers, gym wear or t-shirts)

One of the great things about a Click event is that we do our best to gender balance our mixers.... Meaning that we keep the male/female ratio close and never let our parties have either WAY too many men or WAY too many women. As we get closer to the event date, we may shut down ticket sales for one gender to help keep the ratios balanced. Therefore we highly recommend getting your ticket/s as soon as possible to secure your spot.

TICKET PRICE: $20
Ticket price will be going up to $30 at the door so we recommend getting them ahead of time to save money and guarantee your spot.
GET YOUR TICKETS AT: http://www.ClickMixers.com/over40.html
results.name: 40 & Over Valentine Singles Mixer - Light Appetizers, Prizes, Over 150 Singles!

results.description:
Valentine's weekend is almost here and it's the perfect time to get out there and find that special someone. We realize that online dating can be tedious and all the bars in NYC are packed with 20s & 30s. That's why we've created this Valentine's event filled with more mature singles (40s & 50s)!  

GET TICKETS HERE - https://dljparty.ticketleap.com/4087/dates/Feb-13-2016_at_0730PM

Prepay Only Event. Tickets Not Sold At Door. 

What to expect: 

• Free Light Appetizers (8-9pm) 

• Drink Specials

• Great Music At Right Volume For Mingling 

• 150+ singles in their 40s, 50s+ 

• Ice Breakers & Prizes 

*MUST PURCHASE TICKET IN ADVANCE HERE ($20) - https://dljparty.ticketleap.com/4087/dates/Feb-13-2016_at_0730PM

*Price goes up to $30 as the event date gets closer. We recommend getting tickets ASAP to save $ and guarantee your spot. This event will sell out, especially for women. 

• As date gets closer, we may shut down tix for one gender to help keep the ratios balanced.  Get tix ASAP to secure your spot, especially women.

• Typically 75% of attendees come alone (25% bring friends) 

• Dress Code: Neat, Professional or Trendy (No sneakers, gym wear or t-shirts) 

• MULTI-MEETUP GROUP EVENT. 100+ SINGLES WILL BE ATTENDING. THE RSVP LIST ON THIS PAGE IS ONLY A SMALL PORTION OF ACTUAL ATTENDEES.

PREPAY ONLY - https://dljparty.ticketleap.com/4087/dates/Feb-13-2016_at_0730PM

results.description:
Wow - Valentine weekend is already here! Come on out and make it a great weekend at our 40 & Over Valentine Singles Mixer! We get it... You want to meet someone but don't feel like hanging out in bars among a bunch of 20 somethings or wasting time weeding through online dating profiles. You've been there, done that and want to find your mature match who is tired of all the childish games and ready for something real. Well... our 40 & Over Valentine Singles Mixer is the perfect place for you!

So what's a Click event? Ever find yourself looking across the bar and saying, “He’s cute, I wonder if he’s single” or “She seems nice, but maybe she has a boyfriend". Well, wonder no more! Everyone at a Click event is single and looking to meet someone. At every Click event we set up fun ice breakers to get the party going (during which you can win prizes!) You can participate or just relax and mingle at your own pace.

We get it... You want to meet someone special but don't feel like hanging out in bars amongst a bunch of recent college grads or wasting time weeding through online dating profiles. You've been there, done that and want to find your mature match who is tired of all the childish games and ready for something real. Well... our Singles Mixer is the perfect place for you!

Event runs from 6:30-9:30pm

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

$20 for our members - Prepay here https://40sclickmixer.eventbrite.com

$30 at the door if available

All ATWYS members who pay in advance for this event will receive a promo code for $7 off a speeddating event as well as $5 off our Mix & Mingle Happy Hour. Please be sure to check your eventbrite order confirmation for the promo codes to use to redeem your discount.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Over 150 Single Professionals Attending!

Drink Specials!

Win Prizes!

Music At Just The Right Volume For Mingling

Typically 70% of Attendees Come Alone (30% bring friends)

* Over 200 Single Professionals Attending

* Suggested Age Range: Late 30's to 50's

We are thrilled to feature Sweet Megg and the Wayfarers for the first time at the Swing Remix dance party on Saturday February 13th, 2016. We're planning a Valentine theme as well.


Facebook page for this event: https://www.facebook.com/events/1661375057463632/

DANCE TIMELINE


6:30 Pre-Dance workshop (open)


7:30 Pre-Dance workshop (intermediate)

7:30 General Admission Doors Open


7:45 BEGINNER Dance Lesson (FREE with dance admission)


8:30 LIVE MUSIC & SOCIAL DANCING


10:45 Dance Performances, Announcements, Give Aways


11:00 LIVE MUSIC & SOCIAL DANCING


1:00AM END


All Ages

meta.description: Searches for recent and upcoming public events hosted by Meetup groups. Its search window  is the past one month through the next three months, and is subject to change. Open Events is optimized to search for current events by location, category, topic, or text, and only lists Meetups that have **3 or more RSVPs**. The number or results returned with each request is not guaranteed to be the same as the page size due to secondary filtering. If you're looking for a particular event or events within a particular group, use the standard [Events](/meetup_api/docs/2/events/) method.
meta.title: Meetup Open Events v2
